results.title: Antidiabetic drug metformin affects the developmental competence of cleavage-stage embryos.
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@-sensitizing effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ helps in improving from @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ features such as @DISEASE_Hyperandrogenism @DISEASE_MESH:D017588 @@@hyperandrogenism@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Anovulation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@, and @DISEASE_Infertility @DISEASE_MESH:D007246 @@@infertility@@@.

results.text_hl: LOD/LOD-@CHEMICAL_Clomiphene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002996 @@@CC@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with CCR-@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ who also have @<m>DISEASE_Anovulation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@.

results.title: Is metformin the treatment of choice for anovulation in polycystic ovary syndrome?
results.text_hl: Is @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ the treatment of choice for @<m>DISEASE_Anovulation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@?

results.title: Metformin therapy in a hyperandrogenic anovulatory mutant murine model with polycystic ovarian syndrome characteristics improves oocyte maturity during superovulation
results.text_hl: Additionally, the observed in vivo effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the hyperleptinemic db/db strain may infer that a subset with the @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ reproductive phenotype characterized by @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Anovulation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@, and hyperleptinemia may be more responsive to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ than those without elevated @GENE_LEP @GENE_16846 @@@leptin@@@ levels.

citations.NLM: Sabatini ME, Guo L, Lynch MP, Doyle JO, Lee H, Rueda BR, Styer AK. Metformin therapy in a hyperandrogenic anovulatory mutant murine model with polycystic ovarian syndrome characteristics improves oocyte maturity during superovulation J Ovarian Res. 2011 May 23;4(1):8. PMID: 21605417
citations.BibTeX: @article{21605417, title={Metformin therapy in a hyperandrogenic anovulatory mutant murine model with polycystic ovarian syndrome characteristics improves oocyte maturity during superovulation}, author={Sabatini ME and Guo L and Lynch MP and Doyle JO and Lee H and Rueda BR and Styer AK}, journal={J Ovarian Res}, volume={4}, number={1}, pages={8}}

results.title: Treatment strategies for women with WHO group II anovulation: systematic review and network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Despite the promising results shown in this study, neither @CHEMICAL_Letrozole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077289 @@@letrozole@@@ nor @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ are approved for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Anovulation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@ in many countries and continue to be used off-label.

citations.NLM: Wang R, Kim BV, van Wely M, Johnson NP, Costello MF, Zhang H, Ng EH, Legro RS, Bhattacharya S, Norman RJ, Mol BW. Treatment strategies for women with WHO group II anovulation: systematic review and network meta-analysis BMJ. 2017 Jan 31;356():j138. PMID: 28143834
